title: The Little Prince
plot: A brave girl discovers the timeless tale of the Little Prince, blurring the line between imagination and reality.

title: 3 Idiots
plot: Three friends reunite and revisit the wild journey that taught them to follow their hearts instead of convention.

title: Interstellar
plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Song of the Sea
plot: Ben and his little sister Saoirse embark on a magical journey rooted in Celtic myth.

title: Little Women
plot: Jo March reflects on her life with her three sisters as they push against the expectations placed on women.
